Email.Subject: Welcome hacker!
Email.Content:
Welcome, 
we are happy you joined our company as a white hacker. Shortly we will sent you an email that grants you access to our network and in which we will elaborate on your first task.
Wish you luck,
Jackob

Email.Subject: Your first job
Email.Content:
Hello again,
you will be working on a case of our security lucking sharpness. We suspect Dave because he is our intern at the time, so he will be your first target.
Try hack into his device.
We granted you access to bruteForce program it should help do the job.
Good luck,
Jackob

Email.Subject: Next target!
Email.Content:
Hi,
unfortunately as u may see Dave don't have much on his phone.
Try now crack Arasha computer. It will be harder task so we grant you access to dictionaryAttack program.
Good luck,
Jackob

Tasks.Name: taskName3_2
Comunication: O, dose big P writes to recently?
Just to ask how was status on those reports, why you ask?
Oh, nothing he rumble something about password changes and I have not done this yet
No no he didn't mention you. But I heard is easy on this security protocols
Yes he is he is the best for that
Okey have to go back to work, bey

Email.Subject: Diffrent aproach
Email.Content:
Hi,
both of them don't have anything on them to prove there are responsible for licks in security.
Maybe try listen to messages between them. You can use manInTheMiddle program to do it. Just granted you access.
Make sure to listen messages between Arasha to Dave. Dave can write many not important questions to Arasha we don't need that.
Good luck,
Jackob

Email.Subject: Big P?
Email.Content:
Hi,
so for the holes in our security is responsible big P!
We can't get you details on who is it but if you find it on your own it will prove that he done some major damage to our security system.
Explore our public devices and I hope you don't find anything.
Good luck,
Jackob

Email.Subject: Braking
Email.Content:
Hi,
so you found something, that's not good.
We want to compromise big P but for that we need you to hack into his device first.
It is well protected because our previous security specialist configure it. We grant you permission to rainbowAttack it could be an use hear.
Good luck,
Jackob

Email.Subject: Suprise delivery
Email.Content:
Hi,
we instruct HR to sent new contract for big P thru Arasha. Capture this file and sent to P a file that is in attachment to this mail.
Make sure to fake the notary signature cause other way big P could be suspects about the file. The public notary key should be on our main server.
Good luck,
Jackob

FileToSent.Name: NewContract.pdf
FileToSent.Content: Termination papers for Peter Pelican happening imidetly.

Email.Subject: Job well done
Email.Content:
Hi,
thank you very much for your help. Without your skills we wouldn't be able to truck the licks in our security system.
We will surely be in touch with you for future evaluations.
Best regards,
Jackob
